title: I am done with all this crashing
body: My computer keeps crashing whilst running league and the client. This hasn't started until the new client. It is getting in the way of me having fun with this game.

replies.body: I want to help return your fun, but something serious could be going on if your entire PC is crashing.  Double check your air vents to make sure it has good flow and not overheating.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well, and our tech team can help figure out what's going on.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
